PERSONA:
john is a 58-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he holds a postgraduate degree and has never been married. 

john is a devout protestant and a born-again or evangelical christian. he attends religious services more than once a week and considers himself to be very conservative in his religious and political views. john is a registered republican voter and aligns himself with the conservative wing of the party.

financially, john falls into the upper-income tier, earning $100,000 or more annually. despite his busy schedule, he finds time for volunteerism and is an active member of his community.

john is a frequent internet user, spending almost constant time online. he was born in the united states and has lived there his entire life, holding citizenship from birth. john takes pride in his american identity and values the opportunities his country has provided him.

overall, john is a well-educated, financially stable, and deeply religious individual with strong conservative leanings. he is an active participant in his community and keeps himself well-informed through frequent internet use.
